beer.name: Unplugged Berliner Weiss
beer.description: Napoleon hailed this tart beer style "the Champagne of the North". A lively and elegant masterpiece this Berliner Weiss is a kaleidoscope of fresh flavor. Barrel fermentation, Pinot Grigio, Riesling grapes and Wisconsin White Wheat are bottle fermented with five proprietary yeast strains. A connoisseur's rare jewel both spirited and subtle, Enjoy your sparking toast under summer stars.
